data.title: BALLON D'OR WINNER
data.statement:
Each year, FIFA has to award the Ballon d'Or to one of the players who had an excellent year with both their club and their national team.
Help Us To Give The Big Prize In Football World To the One who deserve it.
The player who earned the maximum points deserves to win the Ballon d'Or.

data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read S:string(999)
write Nymare RVP Brazil 132
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1>>: An integer [[N]] representing the number of players.
<<Next [[N]] lines>>: A String [[S]] containing the following information for each player:
Player Name.
Player Club Name.
Player National Team Name.
Number of Goals, 1 goal = 2 points.
Number of Assists, 1 assist = 1 points.
Trophies with his National Team, 1 trophy = 20 points.
Trophies with his Club, 1 trophy = 10 points.
The Elements Separated By  "{{-}}" .
data.outputDescription:
[[String]]: contains the name of the winner, his club and his national team.
[[P]]: Integer for the total points he earned.
All outputs must be on the same line and space separated.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Each year, FIFA has to award the Ballon d'Or to one of the players who had an excellent year with both their club and their national team.
Help Us To Give The Big Prize In Football World To the One who deserve it.
The player who earned the maximum points deserves to win the Ballon d'Or.
Input
Line 1: An integer N representing the number of players.
Next N lines: A String S containing the following information for each player:
Player Name.
Player Club Name.
Player National Team Name.
Number of Goals, 1 goal = 2 points.
Number of Assists, 1 assist = 1 points.
Trophies with his National Team, 1 trophy = 20 points.
Trophies with his Club, 1 trophy = 10 points.
The Elements Separated By "-" .
Output
String: contains the name of the winner, his club and his national team.
P: Integer for the total points he earned.
All outputs must be on the same line and space separated.
Constraints
5 ≤ N ≤ 50.
Example
Input
10
Messi-FCB-Argentina-30-21-0-1
Ronaldo-RMD-Portugal-48-12-0-4
Neymar Jr-PSG-Brazil-20-17-1-2
Mbappe-PSG-France-29-8-0-2
Lewandowski-BYM-Poland-35-8-0-2
Mane-LVP-Senegal-17-16-1-1
Hazard-CHE-Belgium-23-17-0-0
De Bruyne-MUC-Belgium-18-24-0-2
Kane-THO-England-29-9-0-0
Salah-LVP-Egypt-30-13-0-1
Output
Ronaldo RMD Portugal 148
